comment: The join of a poset commutes. (The antecedent ` <. X , Y >. e. dom .\/ /\ <. Y , X >. e. dom .\/ ` i.e. "the joins exist" could be omitted as an artifact of our particular join definition, but other definitions may require it.) (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.) (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
